description:
Are you non-technical and don’t want to create or maintain a Word Press website? Are you looking for a free website and simple website with SEO benefits that can potentially get you ranked on Google’s page 1? You are in the right place because this high quality and interactive course by Louise Anne Maurice of 90 Day Guru E-Learning was created for you and recently updated April 1, 2016.

Best Websites for Life Coaches, Online Teachers, Authors and Consultants is for you if:

  • You see the money making and marketing potential of having a website that sells and builds your prospect list but you want the best step-by-step guidance for how to get started.
  • You want website creation best practices, website templates and simple website formulas for ranking #1 on Google that have already been tested and proven to work.
  • You would like free and simple ways to create a website quickly and easily so that you can use it as a marketing tool to boost your book, course and program sales.
  • You would like to know how you can make a quality website without spending thousands of dollars.
  • You are ready to develop a simple website plan to easily sell books, courses and programs online.

******************************************************************************************************************

Why take Best Websites for Life Coaches, Online Teachers, Authors and Consultants?

  • This is why you are here because you want to know how to create a website, get that website ranked high in the search engines and use that website to sell in the shortest amount of time without it costing you a small fortune.
  • The best part is; every piece of advice, strategy and logical approach to website creation and website search engine optimization has been tested; none of this is theory.

****************************************************************************************************************

What is covered in Best Websites for Life Coaches, Online Teachers, Authors and Consultants?

  1. Learn strategies that you can use while taking this create a website course plus receive valuable resources that you can download and use after you complete the course.
  2. Walk away with website creation foundation pieces that help Authors, Online Teachers, Life Coaches and Consultants to dominate search results and rank #1 on Google for their field of expertise.
  3. Non-technical free website creation tactics that help Author, Online Teachers, Life Coaches and Consultant websites get noticed by search engines quicker and dominate the web.
  4. Use simple website search engine optimization that makes your website work for you so you don’t have to work as hard maintaining your website.
  5. Follow step-by-step processes for creating a simple website that sells so you don't have to
  6. Receive website coaching that guides and assesses your ability to handle the pressures of developing an online global business that works 24-7 plus website consulting best practices advice.
  7. Discover the ultimate website success formula all Authors, Online Teachers, Life Coaches and Consultants need to rise to the top

***************************************************************************************************************

How does Best Websites for Life Coaches, Online Teachers, Authors and Consultants benefit you?

  • I understand how to create a non-technical simple website that sets you up for success.
  • I started my online business back in 2009. I knew nothing about online businesses so I had to learn how to start a website from scratch. I dominated the search engines for my field of expertise.
  • In this course, you learn the exact steps you need to know to create a website in a short amount of time. You receive a website creation formula that you can follow for success.
  • You get easy to understand non-technical insights that only a professional with my background can give you.
  • You get the inside track on what you need to do to succeed online plus what you need to do to follow through.
  • If that's something you would like to achieve, you have selected the right course to take. If you complete this entire course and implement everything you learn you will have a completed website with a search engine optimization plan that you can follow to get your website ranked #1 plus start selling online.
  • Remember, it doesn't matter if you are new or already in full swing, I've been there and I can show you exactly what you need to do to make it happen.

***************************************************************************************************************

When Can You Take Best Websites for Life Coaches, Online Teachers, Authors and Consultants?

  • What are you waiting for? If you’re looking for a course to learn how to create a website that sells for you and gets you ranked on Google’s page 1, then look no further.
  • Start learning right now or take the course when it is convenient for you! The course can be accessed 24-7 from most devices with an internet connection.
  • Once a member of the course, you receive lecture updates, advice and coaching guidance for life; NO EXTRA COST TO YOU.
  • REMEMBER: If you are not completely satisfied, you can get a full money back refund, so long as you request it within 30 days of purchase – No questions asked.
  • Click on the "Take This Course" button and start learning instantly

***************************************************************************************************************

Still not convinced? Make sure you watch some of the FREE PREVIEWS available to learn more about the course and more about me your instructor. Plus you can check out some of the reviews. Here is just one of the many examples:

What people are saying about Best Websites for Life Coaches, Online Teachers, Authors and Consultants created by Louise Anne Maurice of 90 Day Guru E-Learning:

"Attention to Details - This website course was designed for those of us that don’t spend our days using html. I felt comfortable because the instructor explained everything as she showed it on screen. She gave outlines to use and examples to follow. Simple and easy!"
